To make this treat, start by making a batch of your favorite cookie dough. Roll the dough out onto a cookie sheet and cut out shapes with cookie cutters. Place the cookie shapes on a baking sheet and bake according to the instructions on the cookie dough package. Once the cookies are cooled, layer them with your favorite sandwich filling and top with another cookie. Enjoy!

To make the cookie cookie sandwich, you will need two cookies, a layer of frosting or icing, and a layer of your favorite filling. Spread the frosting or icing on one side of each cookie and then place the filling in between the two cookies. Finally, press the two cookies together to form the cookie cookie sandwich.
